p: The ABTS radical scavenging activity of the extract is shown in Fig. 2. The scavenging activity of the extract increased up to 91% at 0.5 mg/ml. The extract had potent antioxidant activity with an IC 50 value of 0.150 mg/ml. Ascorbic acid and BHA had IC 50 of 0,258 mg/ml and 0,300 mg/ml, respectively.
